snippet.title: Arcade Game: Steeplechase (1975 Atari) No Sound
snippet.description:
A horse racing game where you can play up to 6 players to play against each other. You can always play against the computer with horse number 7You have to jump over obstacles on a horizontal course. The monitor has 6 rows for each horse with individual color overlay. The fastest horse wins. 

Anyone interested in trying out this game, here it is:
http://adamulation.blogspot.com/

Note: Comments for gameplay videos with no sound are now disable because they video is subject to be reuploaded when ever sound is added to the game. Once the sound has been added, it will be reuploaded and comments will be enabled.
